EmailTemplate.description: PSA-IQVIAPSA-5347 - Relieve Primary BRM Analyst Assignment Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET19_PSA_Relieve Primary BRM Analyst Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Primary BRM Analyst Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Primary BRM Analyst listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Primary BRM Analyst is: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Primary_BRM_Analyst__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You.
